dict.acceptation: 灰尘；（建筑物内、家具或地板等上的）灰尘；遗骸，尸体，人体，人；〈口〉金粉，粉末，粉剂，花粉；
撒（粉）于；擦去…的灰尘；擦灰；撢去；

sent.orig: The dedusting equipment mainly includes dust catcher, dust collector, centrifugal dust separator and wet dust collector.
sent.trans: 除尘设备主要包括电除尘器、布袋除尘器、旋风除尘器和湿式除尘器等。

sent.orig: The dust car stops under the dust removing mouth first when the dust remover removes dust.
sent.trans: 卸灰机卸灰时，灰车先停在灰斗卸灰口的下方。

sent.orig: Dust removal equipment users can choose wet dust removal or bag dust removal.
sent.trans: 除尘设备用户可选择湿式除尘和袋式除尘。

sent.orig: Big bag type dust collector is classified as impulse dust cleaning and back blow dust cleaning.
sent.trans: 大型袋式除尘器有脉冲清灰、反吹清灰二大类。

sent.orig: Ashes to ashes, dust to dust -- Majordomo Executus.
sent.trans: 尘归尘，土归土--管理者埃克索图斯。
